name: Reconnaissance - Acquire Access (T1650)
description: Detects attempts to acquire access to accounts, hosts, or services as part of reconnaissance or resource development. Adversaries may attempt credential use, remote session creation, or network share mounting.
author: Wahid Hendrawan
query: process.name:(powershell.exe OR cmd.exe OR runas.exe OR cmdkey.exe OR psexec.exe) AND (process.args:(*net use* OR *cmdkey* OR *runas* OR *Invoke-Command* OR *Enter-PSSession* OR *New-PSSession* OR *Get-Credential* OR *ConvertTo-SecureString* OR *\\* OR *C$*))
